narrative.title: Xiii Corps - 1941Q2
narrative.situation: British Operational Corps deployed in North Africa during 1941Q2.
narrative.objectives: Operational-level formation responsible for coordinating combined-arms offensive to relieve Tobruk and recapture Cyrenaica from Axis forces. Executed Operation Battleaxe (15-17 June 1941).
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: coastal plain (Sollum-Bardia) and rocky desert plateau (escarpment)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Mobile operations in open desert terrain

environment.terrain_type: coastal plain (Sollum-Bardia) and rocky desert plateau (escarpment)
